name: Mercenary Leto
description: Action, upgrades, and one cool cat wizard. Travel the galaxy as a mercenary with a fluffy dragon alongside a cast of endearing characters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 10.0 compatible sound card
